::Repugnus::
Repugnus looses his grip on the bot as he walks.
"Talk, or I'll send you to the pit."
He he takes a swing with his large pincers at the bots head.

Yanshosh@... wrote:

> ::::
> 
> The large bot mumbles something incoherent and continues forward even 
> though he was pinned. His large size (width-wise as well as length-wise) 
> gave him enough weigth to make it very hard for his foe to keep him in 
> place. He was completely unaware of any other bots around him.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...> wrote:
>  > ::Repugnus::
>  > Repugnus watched the bot stumble by.
>  > "You dare...you dare to just walk by me without addressing....How doare
>  > you exhaust pipe. " He said.
>  > He thought of using his pincers to send and distort colors, but thr
>  > drunk bot would probably have no affect to it already.  He rand at the
>  > bot trying to pin him against the wall with his pincer.
>  >
>  > Yanshosh@a... wrote:
>  >
>  > > ::::
>  > >
>  > > The drunk stumbled by, oblivious to anyone addressing him. He crashes
>  > > into a wall but rights himself, and stumbles further down the steps.

>  > >

>  > >  > The run down bot knew he was being  followed, his scences were
>  > > amzing.
>  > >  > He was afterall the infamous Autobot Repugnas.  He was the unsung
>  > > hero
>  > >  > for he took the dirty jobs where no one else would and when he got
>  > >  > back his attitude set people apart from him.  He stopped and turned.
